summary: Bug verification testing completed. Both reported bugs have been FIXED: 1) Weather displays correctly with temperature in °C (28°C shown), 2) Hamburger menu is correctly hidden on desktop and visible only on mobile. All expandable sections (Clima, Marés, Luas) work correctly. Navigation and login functionality verified.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Unicode encoding issue in weather texts (\u00e7 etc)
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Weather displays 'Condições atuais' correctly without encoding issues

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Hamburger menu appearing on desktop when should only appear on mobile
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Hamburger menu hidden on desktop (1920x1080), visible on mobile (390x844)

features_tested.details: Shows 28°C correctly with proper Portuguese text
Hidden on desktop (md:hidden), visible on mobile (flex md:hidden wrapper)
Expands on click showing Temperatura (28°C), Sensação (30°C), Vento (3.5 m/s), Umidade (75%)
Expands on click showing tide times: 06:30 (alta 2.3m), 12:45 (baixa 0.5m), 18:50 (alta 2.1m)
Expands on click showing moon phases: Lua Nova, Quarto Crescente, Lua Cheia, Quarto Minguante
All links work: Início, Clima, Marés, Luas, Produtos, Login
Login with admin/admin123 works, redirects to dashboard
Returns correct data: temp=28, feels_like=30, humidity=75, wind_speed=3.5, source=estimado

context_for_next_testing_agent: All reported bugs have been verified as fixed. Weather API returns MOCKED/estimated data when OPENWEATHER_API_KEY is not configured. Tides API also returns fallback data (tabuademares.com returns 403). Login credentials are admin/admin123.

mocked_apis_list: /api/weather - Returns estimated data (temp=28°C) when OPENWEATHER_API_KEY not set
/api/tides - Returns fallback data (tabuademares.com API returns 403 Forbidden)
